posts.post_content:
@grothesk  
  
Here's how this guy's flavor works: First, he's in avacyn precisely BECAUSE he doesn't fit. He's a 60,000 ton beast who grazes on redwoods, he doesn't card about your stupid card sets. Second, he doesn't "inspire" the other creatures to make them bigger. When you summon him, he falls out of the sky trampling your opponent's army. Then, the shockwave throws all of your creatures into the air, and they become high-intensity projectile weapons as they fall from the sky. They get bonuses from holding on to each other for dear life.
posts.html:
@grothesk

Here's how this guy's flavor works: First, he's in avacyn precisely BECAUSE he doesn't fit. He's a 60,000 ton beast who grazes on redwoods, he doesn't card about your stupid card sets. Second, he doesn't "inspire" the other creatures to make them bigger. When you summon him, he falls out of the sky trampling your opponent's army. Then, the shockwave throws all of your creatures into the air, and they become high-intensity projectile weapons as they fall from the sky. They get bonuses from holding on to each other for dear life.

posts.post_content: THE Finisher in Mono-Green EDH. Get one of these after you score hordes of puppies with [Howl of the Night Pack](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Howl of the Night Pack) or [Wolfbriar Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wolfbriar Elemental). There aren't many green beatsticks that are win conditions as decisively as this card. Even on its own or with 1 other creature 7/7 Trample Haste that gives the other creature trample means heavy damage if left unanswered.

Sacrifice 8 squirrels with [Phyrexian Altar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Altar) to add ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) to your mana pool.
